plot: Peter is not so quick to be wiped away by Julia. He suspects that she has problems and wants to help her; Bertram receives an offer from the glider instructor to work as a fitter in his car workshop. The salary is not very high, but Bertram hopes to maybe get flying lessons. Denise is not enthusiastic about these prospects; Elke makes a confession to the police. Although she cannot remember the events of the night, she is convinced that she killed Michael Döring. Then a witness appears who claims to have seen her at the time of the crime.
